instruction: Compare two scientific methods by their accuracy and identify which one is more reliable.
input:
Method 1: Bayesian Inference
Method 2: Maximum Likelihood Estimate
output: Bayesian Inference is generally more accurate and reliable than Maximum Likelihood Estimate. This is because Bayesian Inference takes into account prior beliefs, assumptions, and data which makes it more accurate and reliable. In comparison, Maximum Likelihood Estimate only considers the data and does not take into account prior beliefs.
